archimate:ApplicationFunction.name: Service Task Item Sequence Control
archimate:ApplicationFunction.documentation: Service Task Item Sequence Control: Because of the �Service Task Item Decomposition� of an orchestration request the result may be several actions that need to take place in a specific sequence. Each action is an item in the �Service Task Item Sequence� and will perform according to a pre-configured configuration. The �Service Task Item Sequence Control� controls the execution of each Item�s action.
